title: Condominium education trust fund
context: ยง514B-71 Condominium education trust fund. (a) The commission shall establish a condominium education trust fund that the commission shall use for educational purposes. Educational purposes shall include financing or promoting: (1) Education and research in the field of condominium management, condominium project registration, and real estate, for the benefit of the public and those required to be registered under this chapter; (2) The improvement and more efficient administration of associations; (3) Expeditious and inexpensive procedures for resolving association disputes; and (4) Support for mediation of condominium related disputes. (b) The commission shall use all moneys in the condominium education trust fund for purposes consistent with subsection (a). [L 2005, c 93, pt of ยง3; am L 2013, c 187, ยง2]
